title: Set up real domain for tickboard cloud
description: Configure a proper domain (e.g., tickboard.io) instead of workers.dev URL
notes:
2026-01-16 20:41 - Created DOMAIN_SETUP.md with comprehensive instructions for setting up tickboard.io domain. The Go client already has DefaultCloudURL = wss://tickboard.io/agent, so once the domain is configured in Cloudflare, everything will work. Manual steps needed: 1) Register/purchase domain, 2) Add to Cloudflare, 3) Configure DNS records, 4) Uncomment routes in wrangler.toml, 5) Deploy. Consider using Cloudflare's 'Custom Domains' feature for simpler setup.
2026-01-16 20:52 - (from: human) just acquired tickboard.dev with cloudflare. can you set up with wrangler?
2026-01-16 20:55 - (from: Peter Engelbrecht) Reopened
